          <title>
            <string language="fr">Lumière et vision</string>
            <string language="en">Light and vision</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht und Anblick</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz e visão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce e visione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως και όραμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz y visión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre un garçon, un conducteur de  voiture, et un landau dans différentes positions près d'un bâtiment.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a boy, a car driver, and a pram at different positions near a building.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Allumez</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">trajet de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light path</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">propagation rectiligne</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vision</string>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen Jungen, einen 
Autotreiber und einen Pram in unterschiedlichen Positionen nahe einem 
Gebäude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um menino, um excitador do 
carro, e um pram em posições diferentes perto de um edifício.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un ragazzo, un driver 
dell'automobile e un pram alle posizioni differenti vicino ad una 
costruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ένα αγόρι, έναν οδηγό 
αυτοκινήτων, και ένα καροτσάκι στις διαφορετικές θέσεις κοντά σε
ένα κτήριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un muchacho, un programa 
piloto del coche, y un cochecito de niño en diversas posiciones cerca
de un edificio.</string>
          </description>
